scripts.build: npx tsc -d && npm pack ../../endpoints-monorepo/core ../../endpoints-monorepo/relay ../../endpoints-monorepo/baker-endpoint && npm install flashbake-core-*.tgz flashbake-relay-*.tgz flashbake-baker-endpoint-*.tgz
scripts.deploy: helm install -f ../tezos-k8s-flashbake-values.yaml flashbake ../tezos-k8s/charts/tezos --namespace flashbake --create-namespace && kubectl apply -f ../flashbake-relay-k8s/flashbake-relay.yaml -n flashbake
